definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Domestic violence is a family matter, do not wash dirty linen in public.
sentences.chinese: 家庭暴力是家務事，家醜不可外揚。
她遭受着家庭暴力之苦。

sentences.english: The local government shall set forth charters and practices for the local Domestic Violence Prevention Committee.
sentences.chinese: 前項家庭暴力防治委員會之組織規程由地方政府定之。

sentences.english: One of them has to do with domestic violence.
sentences.chinese: 其中之一與家庭暴力有關。

sentences.english: Some crimes, like domestic violence, have increased with the rotten economy.
sentences.chinese: 類似家庭暴力這類的犯罪隨着經濟的衰落反而增多。

sentences.english: The so-called domestic abuse, is refers to occurs in the family scope rough stuff.
sentences.chinese: 所謂家庭暴力，是指發生在家庭範圍內的暴力行爲。

sentences.english: Family violences are social question existed commonly in the world.
sentences.chinese: 家庭暴力是世界各國普遍存在的社會問題。

sentences.english: In the end, the sangmyung will how to solve the problem of domestic violence by a real sweet home?
sentences.chinese: 最終，祥明會怎麼樣解決由實香家的家庭暴力問題呢？

sentences.english: In the second section, anti-domestic violence system is compared in different countries and regions.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分反家庭暴力體系的國際和地區比較。

sentences.english: The second part mainly analyzes the significance of anti-family violence under the harmonious society background.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分分析了和諧社會背景下反家庭暴力的意義。

sentences.english: All posts related to Domestic Violence Ordinance (DVO) to be placed here.
sentences.chinese: 這裏放置所有關於《家庭暴力條例》的貼文。

sentences.english: Ltd, a anti-domestic violence organization in Beijing. "Domestic violence is not culture."
sentences.chinese: 該公司是北京一家反對家庭暴力的組織。

sentences.english: Still, domestic abuse within intimate relationships poses a greater threat to women than to men.
sentences.chinese: 更勝，男女關係中女性更喜歡使用家庭暴力。

sentences.english: Sizemore was booked on charges of domestic violence and held on bail of $20,000.
sentences.chinese: 西斯摩爾被控家庭暴力，保釋金爲2萬美元。

definition: domestic violence/abbr. for 家庭暴力[jia1 ting2 bao4 li4]
